note:
He/Him. A dad who loves creative projects and games. Be decent to everyone, but don't tolerate the intolerant. Let's all work together to fix the climate change problem.

Bioengineer, Lab Robot Repair Guy, Video Gamer, Boardgamer, Indie Novelist & Children's Book Writer, and recently, a Tenor 2 Choir Guy.

Currently writing a new novel, a techno thriller where the tech is magic. Check my website for info and to join my monthly newsletter.
